name: Redlizard Studioz Inc
description:
Redlizard Studioz is a mobile app and web solutions convergence company, with the sole purpose of building products that enable clients meet their business goals and objectives.
Redlizard studioz, founded by ex IITian's is an organization of IT engineers with an intent to build technical solutions that enable business clients launch their vision.
Commitment, passion and attention to detail are just three ways to describe our mission here at Redlizard. We are a professional web, game and digital solutions provider located in the US, Canada and India.
Our expertise spans across technologies and platforms and our skills match and exceed our clients expectations each time. With several years experience in the field, our team brings the best in web, gaming and mobile technology.
